actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that a Presidential Task Force on MIAs be established.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President establish a Presidential task force on the missing in action and their families, to propose courses of action to achieve a full accounting, and to make recommendations concerning Federal policies relating to the missing in action.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that a Presidential Task Force on MIAs be established.
